Class ArenaQueueManager

java.lang.Object
com.conquest.queueHandler.ArenaQueueManager
public class ArenaQueueManager extends Object
üè∞ ArenaQueueManager Manages per-arena queue states, match flow, and queue repair after cancellations.

    Inserts a queue group at the front (priority handling).
    static void
    removePlayerFromAllQueues(UUID playerId)
    Removes a player from all queues (if they quit, block, etc).

    Removes a specific queue from the arena queue list.
